body:
Following up on an earlier article, I'm providing a link to the Mac OS X installation instructions that Lasse Riis has written up for us on our wiki.

OS X Installation Instructions

Special thanks to Lasse for his work!

Restored from VimTips archive

This article was restored from the VimTips archive. There's probably missing images and broken links (and even some flash references), but it was still important to me to bring them back.
summary: Following up on an earlier article, I'm providing a link to the Mac OS X installation instructions that Lasse Riis has written up for us on our wiki.
title: Exaile: OS X Installation Instructions
